title: Ultimate Frozen Strawberry Jalapeno Margarita
directions: Fill a blender with ice; blend until ice is crushed. Pour tequila, elderflower liqueur, and jalapeno pepper slices over ice. Add strawberries, limeade, and strawberry daiquiri concentrate; blend until smooth, about 30 seconds.
ingredients: 2 fluid ounces elderflower liqueur (such as St. Germain)
4 slices jalapeno pepper, or to taste
1 fluid ounce frozen strawberry daiquiri concentrate
